name: Ōkinoko Senka (Prizes)
description: Transparent on-chain prize distribution. Split prizes among random winners or predefined recipients with flexible multi-asset support.

functions.name: split_prize_random
functions.description: Randomly select winners from a participant pool and distribute prizes with equal or custom shares per asset. Winners are selected using a verifiable random seed.

parameters.name: Participants
parameters.hintText: List of participant addresses. Full format: hive:alice;hive:bob or Short format: @alice @bob @charlie (auto-converted to hive: format)

parameters.name: Asset Shares
parameters.hintText: You can define the percentage shares per asset for winners. If empty, all assets are split equally among winners.

parameters.name: Transfer Type
parameters.hintText: Enable L1 withdrawal to Hive blockchain. Default is L2 transfer (Magi Network).

parameters.name: Prize Amount
parameters.hintText: Total prize amount to distribute. You can provide multiple transfer intents for multi-asset distributions.

functions.hintText: Asset shares must sum to 100% per asset. If no shares provided, all assets are distributed equally among winners.

functions.name: split_prize_defined
functions.description: Distribute prizes to predefined winners with custom share percentages or fixed amounts per asset. Each winner can receive different assets with custom allocations.

parameters.name: Winners and Prizes
parameters.hintText: Winner entries (supports @username format). Percentage: hive:alice#50#hive or @alice#50#hive. Fixed: hive:alice#5.000#hive#fixed or @alice#5.000#hive#fixed. Multi-asset: hive:alice#(50#hive,60#hbd);hive:bob#(30#hive,40#hbd)

parameters.name: Transfer to L1
parameters.hintText: Enable L1 withdrawal to Hive blockchain. Default is L2 transfer (Magi Network). Use 'true', '1', or 'yes' to enable.

parameters.name: Prize Amount
parameters.hintText: Total prize amount to distribute. You can provide multiple transfer intents for multi-asset distributions.

functions.hintText: Percentage mode: shares must sum to 100% per asset. Fixed mode: specify exact amounts. Cannot mix modes for the same asset.
